Ancestry-Dragonfolk -- Male Dragonfolk Novice Adventurer
Attributes (6 Points):
Agility: d6 Smarts: d4 Spirit: d6 Strength: d6 Vigor: d10
Attribute Notes: Cold-Blooded: 10 min in 60F/18C environment inflicts -1 Agility, Strength, and Vigor
Skills (12 Points):
Academics: (sma) d4 Intimidation: (spi) d4 Shooting: (agi) d4
Alchemy: (sma) d4 Notice: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d6
Athletics: (agi) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4-1 Survival: (sma) d4
Battle: (sma) d4 Psionics: (sma) d4 Thievery: (agi) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Repair: (sma) d4 Weird Science: (sma) d4
Skill Notes:
Mean: -1 Persuasion
Amorous: -2 on Tests vs. Attractive character
Size: 0
Advances: 0 Improvement Points: 4 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 2; Edge: 2
Features
Edges (1 points): Fey Blood Hindrances: Amorous; Driven; Mean; Pacifist Dragonfolk Features: Armor +2; Bite; Breath Weapon; Claws; Cold-Blooded; Environmental Resistance (Heat); Environmental Weakness (Cold); Ill-Tempered
Feature Notes:
Ill-Tempered: Has Arrogant+ hindrance
Driven: Personal goal affects decision-making
Mean: Ill-tempered and disagreeable
Combat
Parry: 2 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 10 (3) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Tunic Shield: None Weapons: Bite (d6+d4); Claws (d6+d4); Dagger (d6+d4 R3"); Short Bow (2d6 R12"); Unarmed (d6+d0)
Combat Notes:
Armor+2: +2 Armor
Bite: Fangs are a natural weapon
Claws: Claws are a natural weapon
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +5
Arrogant+: Always takes on the biggest threat
Breath Weapon: Successful Athletics inflicts 2d6 fire damage in 9" cone or 12" line
Environmental Resistance (Heat): +4 vs. heat and fire effects/-4 damage from heat and fire
Environmental Weakness (Cold): -4 vs. cold effects/+4 damage from cold
Fey Blood: May make free reroll to resist enemy powers and spell-like effects
Pacifist: Will harm others only when no other option available
